name: RunnerSky
description:
RunnerSky is a 3D Low-Poly Platformer where you need to be as fast as possible to reach the end of a floating islands parkour.

                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                  

Features :

  • Make tangible and intangible cloud plaforms to make you way through the level.
  • Slide below obstacles and dash to be faster.
  • Avoid the mud to prevent you from being slowed down.
  • Score the best time possible.
  • Find the 2 chickens hidden in the level (because why not ?).

                                                                                                                  

This game was made in 2 months by six First Year E-Artsup Students as part of an end-of-year project.

GAME ARTISTS :

Antoine CARRARA (3D, VFX)

Camille NGUYEN (3D, Sprites, Skybox)

Nina BOURDON (3D, UI, Sprites)

Stacy LACOSTE (3D, UI)

CREATIVE CODING :

Ewen LE MOAL (Level Design, Music, Game Design, Programming)

Kyllian BONNIER (Programming, Level Design, Game Design)
